issue.title: [Go] invalid FixedSizeArray representation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
FixedSizeArrays are currently represented as 3-buffers data.

but the C++ definition expects a 2-buffers data layout (as all the primitive arrays.)

(uncovered while trying to roundtrip all "integration" tests.)
